titles.title: To extend until June 30, 1995, the temporary suspension of duties on self-folding telescopic shaft collapsible umbrellas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/11/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through June 30, 1995, the suspension of duty on self-folding telescopic shaft collapsible umbrellas chiefly used for protection against rain.
